# Requirements

# Points

Points are coordinates in 2- or 3-dimensional space.  They are represented as numeric vectors in `data.frame` objects or as stand-alone vectors.

```{r message=FALSE}
library( readr )
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dyerlab/ENVS-Lectures/master/data/arapat.csv"
arapat <- read_csv( url )
summary( arapat )
```
